title: Looking for a serious Duo Partner for Season 6
body:
Hello to whom ever reads this,

Looking for a duo partner for ranked to progress throughout the season with, I am currently gold 5. ADC main. Willing to duo with people from Gold-Bronze.

Little information about me, My name is Gary I'm 21 years old. I'm pretty laid back (I don't flame people) and I have a great understanding of the game. Always welcoming advice on how to do things, e.g a bad play and how to avoid/make it better it in future games.

 I enjoy voice communication for league of legends as it makes the game more fun and enjoyable. I Have a Teamspeak server and I can also use Curse.

Add me in on the client {{champion:42}}

replies.body: Hey Im A Support Main and i Currently Gold 5, i only have skype... add me if interested in some ranky
Feel free to add me. Gold last season, currently S1. Looking for people to climb with and have fun

Hey mate! I am currently in Silver 5 and have the same idea as you! Looking to climb! I main mid, jg and supp! I have skype and can get TeamSpeak, definitely agree with you there! Talking makes the game fun! Would you be up for duoing with a silver 5? :)
